CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.6)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY (threadpool)

SET ( THIRDPARTYBOOSTINCLUDES
	threadpool.hpp
)

SET ( BOOSTHELPERINCLUDES
	GTriboolSerialization.hpp
)

INSTALL ( FILES ${THIRDPARTYBOOSTINCLUDES} DESTINATION include/thirdparty/boost
	PERMISSIONS
	OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE
	GROUP_READ
	WORLD_READ
)

INSTALL ( FILES ${BOOSTHELPERINCLUDES} DESTINATION include/thirdparty/boost
	PERMISSIONS
	OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE
	GROUP_READ
	WORLD_READ
)
